lexUnit.name: weakness.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the quality or state of being weak, and/or the incapability to resist great force

sentence.text: The cut was said by observers to reflect the gravity of the country 's financial difficulties and the weakness of the world cocoa market .
The weakness of wood is in compression along the grain .

Whatever its weaknesses , Switzerland always has a couple of aces up the sleeve .
